Just my opinion obviously but this movie is crap. Seann Williams Scott's character is so odd and I couldn't really get past it. I understand he's supposed to be a nice guy that can just beat the shit out of people but the character just comes off awkward. I'd say the character seems more like he borders on retarded. 

I would say it's not really worth watching. I also wish they would stop giving roles to Jay Baruchel. He was crap in this and crap in The Sorcerer's Apprentice. I did think he did good in Tropic Thunder though...

@lassik2, I hate to say it, but I couldn't disagree more, I loved seeing seann in a movie where he wasn't a 'Stifler' style character. I do however agree with you on jay baruchel, fucking terrible actor, really annoying.

@ghostlife

Happy to see somebody else who liked this movie, its different and seann does a really good job doing this movie.

@govermint and ghostlife:
If you liked this for the non Stifler character, check out, Stark Raving Mad... If you can find it with seeders! (if you do, please let me know!)
